title: Practice Challenge
description:
Create a function that:
1. Fetches a random user from: https://randomuser.me/api/
2. Extracts the name (results[0].name.first)
3. Returns the name
4. Handles errors appropriately

Hint: The API returns { results: [{name: {first: 'John', last: 'Doe'}}] }
instructions:
Create a function that:
1. Fetches a random user from: https://randomuser.me/api/
2. Extracts the name (results[0].name.first)
3. Returns the name
4. Handles errors appropriately

Hint: The API returns { results: [{name: {first: 'John', last: 'Doe'}}] }

hints.text: let response = await fetch(url); let data = await response.json(); return data.results[0].name.first;

commonMistakes.consequence: This can lead to errors or unexpected behavior.
